| History                 = Yao-Ai Industries was a Chinese state company that was building an oil pipeline in [[Transia]]. [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] blew it up to force the major powers to get involved and end the Slavic genocide on the Muslims. The chief executive officer of Yao-Ai Industres went to the [[Forbidden City (China)|Forbidden City]] in [[Beijing]] to appeal to the [[Chen Lu (Earth-616)|Radioactive Man]] for his help dealing with Iron Man.{{r|Iron Man: Legacy Vol 1 3}}
